Tretes is one of the nearest mountainous resorts from
. It is a very popular weekend destination - mostly to escape from a bustling and polluted city.
The best way to go to Tretes is by car.

value: From Surabaya: Go to the Waru highway entrance and take the "Malang/Pasuruan" direction. Exit the highway/ toll road at the Sidoarjo checkpoint and continue to drive until you reach a junction (at Porong) turn right and take a long straigth to the south. Until you arrived at Apolo  roundabout, turn right and straight until you reach at Pandaan Police Station roundabout. Turn right at that roundabout and go left and take a long straight climb to Tretes. Or when you will take a right turn at the end of Porong toll road, turn around and go left when you reach the  "Jalan Arteri" entrance. Just trough it until you reach the new toll road construction site then turn right. And take a same route like the previous one.

There is little (if any) public transport here. The best idea is going by car.

You can also take a horse ride (there are some around the market, which is also on the main street).

value: On the way to Tretes (at Prigen, about 15 minutes before you reach Tretes' main road) you will see an orchid nursery on the right.
Beautiful scenery with the view of Mount Welirang, pine trees and flowers
Kakek Bodo waterfall (beware: the road to this waterfall is extremely steep)
Sightseeing: view of Welirang mountain, pine trees, flowers.
Ride a horse to get around
Fruit and vegetables at the market (be sure to bargain)
Rabbit satay foodstalls near the market

There is a Chinese restaurant at the corner of the main street (near Inna Tretes) but it is not certain whether it serves alcoholic drinks.
There are many villas for rent, including on (and near) the main street. There are also some budget hotels along the main street.
The telephone area code for Tretes is 0343. (+62-343)

value: , a large national park-cum-zoo, is less than half an hour away (by car).
, another mountainous resort (10-15 minutes from Tretes)
, a mountain resort with some hot springs (10-15 minutes from Tretes)
